freemium.heading: Resources
freemium.title: Freemium Tier
freemium.description: Design assets, icon analysis, and a community of icon designers where you can ask questions, get feedback, and accelerate your learning.

resources.title: Icon templates for Figma
resources.description: Perfectly structured templates to quickly design new icons in dozens of common sizes.

resources.title: Weekly icon analysis
resources.description: Weekly videos where we break down and recreate beautiful icons we find on the web.

resources.title: Icon designer community
resources.description: A private Discord server where you can get help and give feedback on others' work.

premium.heading: Resources
premium.title: Premium Tier
premium.description: Design assets, icon analysis, and a community of icon designers where you can ask questions, get feedback, and accelerate your learning.

features: Usage metrics + visual debugging with replay
Option to invite 2 collaborators per project
Optional integration with CLI or GitHub

business.title: Business Tier
business.description: Design assets, icon analysis, and a community of icon designers where you can ask questions, get feedback, and accelerate your learning.

features: Dedicated infrastructure (AWS, edge, or private cloud)
Option to sign NDA / data privacy
Private API for dashboards or external BI
